metadata.title: CVE-2024-6501

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 15 SP6

SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP6

SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 15 SP6

metadata.description: A flaw was found in NetworkManager. When a system running NetworkManager with DEBUG logs enabled and an interface eth1 configured with LLDP enabled, a malicious user could inject a malformed LLDP packet. NetworkManager would crash, leading to a denial of service.
